snippet: After spending years working behind the scenes to push for change, Daniel S. Loeb, a hedge fund manager, is once again openly admonishing management and battling a corporate board. The target: Yahoo.
abstract: After spending years working behind the scenes to push for change, Daniel S. Loeb, a hedge fund manager, is once again openly admonishing management and battling a corporate board. The target: Yahoo.

headline.main: Activist Investor Charts Plan to Revitalize Yahoo
headline.print_headline: Activist Investor Charts Plan to Revitalize Yahoo
